author: KDog
title: Nice Little Craft
review: This is your standard tiny Lego Space set - an open-aired vehicle with little to it and a minifig. In this case, I think Lego did a fine job making a nice, little saucer-like ship. You could easily picture a handful of these buzzing around and defending a larger ship like the UFO Interstellar Starfighter. The lack of a cockpit is less disconcerting this time since there's an android piloting the craft. I have the polybagged version of this, which strangely has the Exploriens logo on the bag!
